block.p: THOMAS AKIN, an investor, and Talkot Crossover Fund L.P., Sausalito, Calif., which he manages, acquired an 8.64 percent stake in Dynex Capital Inc., Glen Allen, Va., a real estate investment trust.
THOMAS AKIN, an investor, and Talkot Crossover Fund L.P., Sausalito, Calif., which he manages, acquired an 8.64 percent stake in Dynex Capital Inc., Glen Allen, Va., a real estate investment trust.
ANSYS INC., Canonsburg, Pa., a software maker, agreed to buy ICEM CFD Engineering, Berkeley, Calif., a software developer, for $12.4 million.

FREQUENCY ELECTRONICS INC., Mitchel Field, N.Y., a maker of electronic devices, agreed to buy Gillam S.A., Liege, Belgium, a manufacturer of telecommunications equipment, for $15.3 million in cash and stock.

PECO ENERGY CO., the owner of Philadelphia's electric utility, paid $7.5 million for a 10 percent stake in a project to build nuclear power plants run by Eskom, South Africa's national electric utility.
